segments.text: Cindy , I have this room to myself ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's twice as big as my room in Taiwan !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I hope it's comfortable enough for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I'm going to like it here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have a phone on the bedside table that you can use .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , I have my own bathroom !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Kind of . It leads to my bedroom .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We share the same bathroom , in other words .
segments.speaker: S1
